headline: Research Shows that Eating $0 Every Day Leads to Longer Lives
context: In a new article published in the Journal of Good Science, scientists have shown that humans could extend their lives by $1 years based on daily ingestion of this superfood.
"We haven't been eating right for years," said $2. "We finally have the science that proves we shouldn't have put so much emphasis on $3."
The news has already angered national fast food chain McVanka's, who just launched the Mc$4.

phrases.text: Dana Weimeraner, lead researcher at the Institute for Food Science
The Pallbearer, professional wrestler and accordion collector
Jeffrey Daniels, recipient of the 2017 Janitor of the Year Award
